subject: Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The arbitrator, Fredric R. Horowitz, cited the reduction of Steve Howe’s 1992 lifetime ban in handing Alex Rodriguez a season-long suspension, but failed to mention one highlight.
snippet: The arbitrator, Fredric R. Horowitz, cited the reduction of Steve Howe’s 1992 lifetime ban in handing Alex Rodriguez a season-long suspension, but failed to mention one highlight.
